title: In Bitcoin ETF Battle, Grayscale Is Bringing 'A Gun to a Knife Fight'
description: The Grayscale Bitcoin Trust's (GBTC) $27 billion of bitcoin and $350 million of daily volume gives Grayscale an advantage versus BlackRock and other wannabe rivals, according to Bloomberg's Eric Balchunas.

title: The Key to Building Sustainable DePIN
description: Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks (DePIN) are powerful uses of blockchain technology. But success depends on tokenomics built for the long-term, says the co-founder of Hivemapper.

title: Web3 Sports Fantasy Manager Maincard.io is Breaking into Esports with Big-Name Partnerships
description: Irvine, United States, January 8th, 2024, Chainwire Maincard.io, a cutting-edge Web3 sports fantasy manager focusing on sports event prediction and earning rewards by playing, has officially entered the esports arena. This significant move was marked by the formalization of a contract with Community Gaming, a platform for hosting eSports tournaments, and the signing of an ambassador […]

title: What's the Best Cryptocurrency to Buy? Evaluating 6 Top Contenders
description: Discover the top cryptocurrencies to invest in with our comprehensive guide. Explore the features, benefits, and potential of 6 leading contenders to make an informed investment decision in the dynamic world of cryptocurrency

title: Experts Prefer Meme Moguls and Dogecoin (DOGE) Over Shiba Inu (SHIB)
description: Crypto experts are increasingly favoring Meme Moguls and Dogecoin (DOGE) over Shiba Inu (SHIB), reflecting a shift in market trends and investor sentiment.

title: Seven PR Trends to Shape 2024: What Communicators Need to Know
description: In the fast-paced realm of public relations, 2024 is set to be a year of pivotal shifts and challenges. title: PR Secrets for Web3 Projects – Q&A with Anouk Morin, Web3 PR Expert
description: Effective communication and PR are unmissable growth engines for new and existing Web3 projects looking to amplify brand awareness, foster community engagement, and secure investor confidence. title: Multiple spot Bitcoin ETF issuers file amendments with fees
description: BTC broke above $45,000 as BlackRock, Grayscale, ARK 21Shares, and other firms submitted updated spot Bitcoin ETF forms leading up to the first deadline for approval.

title: Fee Wars Heat Up as Spot Bitcoin ETFs Near Approval
description:
Just some days before we can have a final answer from the SEC, All Bitcoin ETF applicants are trying to attract investors by offering low fees. In this article, we’ll explore how these applicants are giving lower fees to investors who want to buy their Bitcoin ETFs. The Landscape of Fee Competition in Bitcoin ETFs […]

The post Fee Wars Heat Up as Spot Bitcoin ETFs Near Approval appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: Cathie Wood Predicts Recession To Hit US Economy This Year, Says Fed ‘Overdid’ Interest Rate Hikes
description:
ARK Invest’s Cathie Wood says a recession will hit the US in 2024 due to what she believes was overly aggressive interest rate hiking from the Federal Reserve. In a new YouTube update, Wood says that the US is already in a “rolling recession,” or a downturn that affects certain sections of the economy at […]

The post Cathie Wood Predicts Recession To Hit US Economy This Year, Says Fed ‘Overdid’ Interest Rate Hikes  appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
